summary: Fixed move command folder picker to display folder names correctly instead of 'table: 0x...' and removed conflicting <C-s> keymap from compose buffers.

artifacts.summary: Fixed folder table handling in move_current_email() and move_selected_emails()
Removed <C-s> keymap conflict from compose buffer keymaps
Implementation summary with verification results and technical details

completion_data.completion_summary: Fixed two task 64 regressions: move command now properly displays folder names (was showing 'table: 0x...') by extracting .name from folder table objects, and removed <C-s> keymap conflict in compose buffers (use <leader>mce instead).

next_steps: Test changes by opening Neovim, navigating to email list, and pressing 'm' to verify folder names display correctly
